definition: to make life longer/to promise longevity/(this product will) extend your life

sentences.english: Length of days is in her right hand, and in her left hand riches and glory.
sentences.chinese: 在她右边是延年益寿，在她左边是富贵荣华。

sentences.english: Two things doth prolong your life: a quiet heart and a loving wife.
sentences.chinese: 心情平静妻贤淑，延年益寿多得福。

sentences.english: People to illnesses and physical, longevity, the need to Sibu.
sentences.chinese: 人要祛病强身，延年益寿，需要食补。

sentences.english: This self-massage is aimed at promoting longevity.
Drinking this preparation regularly promotes your health and prolongs your life-span.
sentences.chinese: 常饮本品，促进健康，延年益寿。

definition: to nourish one's skin/to maintain a youthful appearance
to strengthen one's body/to keep fit/to build up one's health (through exercise, nutrition etc)
Yanshou county in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang/to extend life
(TCM) to build up one's kidney yang/to boost male sex drive
Changshou suburban district of Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
to calm (soothe) the nerves/to relieve uneasiness of body and mind
the way of maintaining good health
to maintain good health/to raise a child or animal/curing (of concrete etc)
